revision.text: ==English== {{wikipedia|Yazdani (surname)}} ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|en|fa|یزدانی}}. ===Proper noun=== {{en-proper noun|Yazdanis}} # {{surname|en|from=Persian}}. ====Statistics==== * According to the 2010 United States Census, ''Yazdani'' is the 29740<sup>th</sup> most common surname in the United States, belonging to 791 individuals. ''Yazdani'' is most common among White (61.57%), Asian/Pacific Islander (20.61%), and Multi-racial (15.17%) individuals. ===Further reading=== * {{R:en:DAFN}}
